title: Rogers : America to suffer more than Russia from The Sansctions
content: Jim Rogers : "Everyone will lose from these sanctions including America, certainly including America. And, unfortunately, Russia temporarily. But, in the end, I’m afraid it’s going to be America, which is going to suffer the most," Jim Rogers started trading the stock market with $600 in 1968.In 1973 he formed the Quantum Fund with the legendary investor George Soros before retiring, a multi millionaire at the age of 37. Rogers and Soros helped steer the fund to a miraculous 4,200% return over the 10 year span of the fund while the S&P 500 returned just 47%.
